languages.text: {n}Брови воина грозно сходятся, и рык его заставляет ваши кости вибрировать. Что-то внутри инстинктивно сжимается перед лицом пост-человеческой ярости.{/n} "Следи за языком, слуга! Иначе я вырву и сожру твою печень, чтобы во вкусе ее распознать, из какого скверного источника произошло твое скудоумие!"

{n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"
languages.original_text: {n}Брови воина грозно сходятся, и рык его заставляет ваши кости вибрировать. Что-то внутри инстинктивно сжимается перед лицом пост-человеческой ярости.{/n} "Следи за языком, слуга! Иначе я вырву и сожру твою печень, чтобы во вкусе ее распознать, из какого скверного источника произошло твое скудоумие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

languages.text: {n}这位战士皱起了眉，咆哮起来，这让你浑身的骨头都颤抖起来。面对这种超越人类的愤怒，你感觉内心的某种东西本能地退缩着。{/n}“说话要当心，仆人！否则我会把你的内脏扯出来吃掉，这样我就能明白，你的愚蠢究竟来自什么肮脏的源头！”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位战士皱起了眉，咆哮起来，这让你浑身的骨头都颤抖起来。面对这种超越人类的愤怒，你感觉内心的某种东西本能地退缩着。{/n}“说话要当心，仆人！否则我会把你的内脏扯出来吃掉，这样我就能明白，你的愚蠢究竟来自什么肮脏的源头！”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}戦士は眉は少し下げる。彼のうなり声に身体が骨まで震えた。このポスト・ヒューマンの怒りを前にして、自分の中の何かが本能的にひるむのを感じた。{/n}「言葉に気をつけろ、下僕め！それ以上馬鹿なことを言ったらあんたの肝臓を引きちぎって食うぞ。その愚かさの源がどこから来たのか舌で味わってやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士は眉は少し下げる。彼のうなり声に身体が骨まで震えた。このポスト・ヒューマンの怒りを前にして、自分の中の何かが本能的にひるむのを感じた。{/n}「言葉に気をつけろ、下僕め！それ以上馬鹿なことを言ったらあんたの肝臓を引きちぎって食うぞ。その愚かさの源がどこから来たのか舌で味わってやる！」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Las cejas del guerrero se bajan y el gruñido que suelta hace que tus huesos vibren. Algo en tu interior recula instintivamente ante la furia del posthumano.{/n} «¡Vigila tus palabras, sirviente! ¡O te arrancaré él hígado para comerlo y ver si descubro el origen de tu insensatez!».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las cejas del guerrero se bajan y el gruñido que suelta hace que tus huesos vibren. Algo en tu interior recula instintivamente ante la furia del posthumano.{/n} «¡Vigila tus palabras, sirviente! ¡O te arrancaré él hígado para comerlo y ver si descubro el origen de tu insensatez!».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier fronce les sourcils et le grognement qui s'échappe de sa gorge fait vibrer jusqu'à vos os. Face à cette rage post-humaine, quelque chose en vous a un mouvement de recul instinctif.{/n} « Faites attention à ce que vous dites, {mf|serviteur|servante} ! Ou je vous arracherai le foie et je le mangerai pour savoir d'où vient votre stupidité ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier fronce les sourcils et le grognement qui s'échappe de sa gorge fait vibrer jusqu'à vos os. Face à cette rage post-humaine, quelque chose en vous a un mouvement de recul instinctif.{/n} « Faites attention à ce que vous dites, {mf|serviteur|servante} ! Ou je vous arracherai le foie et je le mangerai pour savoir d'où vient votre stupidité ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Die Augenbrauen des Kriegers senken sich, und sein Knurren lässt deine Knochen vibrieren. Etwas in deinem Gesicht zuckt instinktiv vor diesem post-menschlichen Zorn zurück.{/n} "Hütet Eure Zunge, {mf|Diener|Dienerin}! Sonst reiße ich Eure Leber heraus und esse sie, damit ich weiß, aus welcher befleckten Quelle Eure Dummheit stammt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

Etwas in deinem Gesicht zuckt instinktiv vor diesem post-menschlichen Zorn zurück.{/n} "Hütet Eure Zunge, {mf|Diener|Dienerin}! Sonst reiße ich Eure Leber heraus und esse sie, damit ich weiß, aus welcher befleckten Quelle Eure Dummheit stammt!"

Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

languages.text: {n}Savaşçının kaşları iniyor. Ciğerlerinden çıkan homurtu, kemiklerini zangırtadıyor. Bu öte insanın öfkesi karşısında içgüdüsel olarak irkiliyorsun.{/n} "Ağzından çıkanlara dikkat et hizmetkâr! Yoksa aptallığının hangi pislikten kaynaklandığını çözmek için o ciğerini söküp yerim."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's eyebrows lower, and the growl he releases makes your bones vibrate. Something inside you instinctively recoils in the face of this post-human rage.{/n} "Watch your tongue, servant! Or I will rip out your liver and eat it so I can discover from what tainted source comes your stupidity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçının kaşları iniyor. Ciğerlerinden çıkan homurtu, kemiklerini zangırtadıyor. İçindeki bir şey, bu öte insan öfkesinin karşısında içgüdüsel olarak irkiliyor.{/n} "Ağzından çıkanlara dikkat et hizmetkâr! Yoksa aptallığının hangi pislikten kaynaklandığını çözmek için o ciğerini söküp yerim."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
